example.eg: Our conversation gave me an idea.
example.egtrans: 我们的交谈让我有了一个想法。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 想法, 念头, 主意

example.eg: My idea of swimming right after dinner was doomed to failure.
example.egtrans: 我晚饭后立即去游泳的计划是注定要失败的。

example.eg: He had some strange ideas about government.
example.egtrans: 他关于政府的某些看法让人觉得不可思议。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 意见, 观点, 看法

example.eg: I got the idea that he wasn't very happy.
example.egtrans: 我有印象他不是很开心。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 印象, 模糊的想法, 感觉

example.eg: I had an idea that you were planning to move down here, but I wasn't certain.
example.egtrans: 我猜你可能计划搬到这里来，但我不是很确定。

example.eg: It's a novel idea, but I think we should give it some thought.
example.egtrans: 这个观点很新鲜，我认为我们应该好好想一想。

example.eg: Beauty, truth, and honesty are all abstract ideas that you can illustrate with specific instances.
The weather's hot - it was a bright idea to bring water with us.
example.egtrans: 天气很热，随身带水是个好主意。

example.eg: Who came up with the bright idea of bringing your mother along?
I've just had a brilliant idea - why don't we arrange a surprise party for Lisa?
Mary championed the idea of increasing recycling at her company.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 支持...计划, 赞同...想法

example.eg: He wouldn't entertain the idea of her cooking for him that evening.
We made a few changes to the wording, but the fundamental idea is still the same.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 基本想法, 基础性观念

example.eg: She did not understand the essay completely but she got the general idea.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 大体的想法，笼统的想法, 一般的观念，普遍的想法

example.eg: The game is easy to play and children soon get the idea.
It is a good idea to brush your long hair before going to sleep.
Sliced bread was a good idea.
"Let's go to the movies." "Good idea! Sounds like fun." .
example.egtrans: “我们去看电影吧。”“好主意！听起来很有趣。”

trans_examp.trans_cn: 好主意！, 聪明！, 就这么办吧！

example.eg: I have an idea that will surprise you.
Do you have an idea of how many people will be coming to the party?

trans_examp.trans_cn: （对某事）了解, 理解, 知情

example.eg: I have no idea how I'm going to get home now my car's broken down.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 毫无了解, 一头雾水

example.eg: We need an ideas man to manage our publicity campaign.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 有创意的人, 谋士, 谋士

example.eg: The lecture as a whole was a little confusing, but I understood the main idea.

dsense.name: no idea
dsense.guideword: informal (I do not know) (非正式用语)

example.eg: Watch TV tonight? Well, that's a novel idea.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 新奇的想法, 新颖的观念

dsense.name: that's the idea
dsense.guideword: informal (that's precisely what is expected) (非正式用语)

trans_examp.trans_cn: 这正是我想要的！这个我赞成！
你明白我的话了！就是这个意思！

example.eg: I have a vague idea of what I want to say, but I don't know how to phrase it.
